original_title: SJB confirms few crossovers after New Year
original_body_lines: SJB MP Nalin Bandara Jayamaha today confirmed that some members from the SJB will cross over to the government after the New Year.
He said this when asked about possible crossovers from SJB to the government after the New Year. “We cannot deny crossovers. A few members from SJB will cross over,” he said in this regard.
Referring to SJB MP Rajitha Senaratne who was in praise of incumbent President Wickremesinghe , the MP said the former always had the intention of crossing over and accepting a ministry.
“Raijitha always had the idea of supporting President Wickremesinghe. Also crossing over is no big deal for him as he had done so several times in the past,” he said. (Yohan Perera)
